title: SpaceX’s Starbase environmental review suffers third delay
summary: The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) has announced that the completion of a crucial ‘environmental assessment’ SpaceX needs to begin orbital-class Starship launch...

title: Solar Orbiter successfully completes historic close pass of the Sun
summary: On March 26, 2022, the joint European Space Agency (ESA) and NASA Solar Orbiter spacecraft successfully completed its first close pass through the Sun’s corona, bringing the spacecraft’s specially-designed collection of instruments closer to the Sun than ever before.

title: NASA to delay Mars Sample Return, switch to dual-lander approach
summary: NASA plans to delay the next phase of its Mars Sample Return campaign and split a lander mission into two separate spacecraft to reduce the overall risk of the program.

title: French startup raises funding to develop solar sails
summary: A French startup has raised an initial round of funding to begin testing of solar sails it believes can sharply reduce the cost of deep space missions.

title: Intelsat rolls out network service that integrates Starlink and geostationary satellites
summary: Satellite operator Intelsat is offering a managed network service that integrates geostationary satellites, SpaceX’s Starlink low Earth orbit constellation and cellular broadband.
